body:
NOTE: I'm NOT making this thread to get attention, it's just NOTIFICATION.

I'm leaving Avicus forever [ :( ] for two reasons

1. I'm getting bored of the server

2. This one is major. I'm going to high school which means I'm preparing for college and I want to be successful. 

I'm sorry to those who I was mean to (if any). I will rarely play minecraft but you can find me at the hive (most likely trouble in mineville). I hope great success in Avicus oh and AMA.

Goodbye, Tigor :)

title: It's a new time for me

replies.body: Farewell, good luck! Don't grow up.
